    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:colos_sl/130191</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:colos_sl/130191</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Določitev sile vrvice</string>
            <string language="en">Determination of the constraint force applied by the suspension</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ermittlung der Begrenzung Kraft traf durch die 
Aufhebung zu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La détermination de la force de contrainte s'est
appliquée par la suspension</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A determinação da força do confinamente 
aplicou-se pela suspensão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La determinazione della forza di vincolo si è 
applicata dalla sospensione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προσδιορισμός της δύναμης περιορισμού που εφαρμόζεται 
από την αναστολή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La determinación de la fuerza del 
constreñimiento se aplicó por la suspensión</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Ravninsko nihalo in predstavitev vrvice kot zelo trde vzmeti.</string>
            <string language="en">Replacing string with spring with high spring constant in case of planar pendulum.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ravninsko nihalo</string>
            <string language="en">planar pendulum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vzmet</string>
            <string language="en">spring</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">mehanika</string>
            <string language="en">mechanics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ersetzen der Zeichenkette mit Frühling mit hoher
Frühling Konstante falls vom planaren Pendel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Substituant la chaîne de caractères avec le 
ressort avec le ressort élevé constant en cas de pendule planaire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Substituindo a corda com a mola com constante 
elevada da mola caso que do pêndulo planar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sostituendo stringa con la molla con l'alto 
costante della molla nel caso del pendolo planare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντικαθιστώντας τη συμβολοσειρά με την άνοιξη με το 
υψηλό ελατήριο σταθερό σε περίπτωση επίπεδου εκκρεμούς.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Substituir la cadena por el resorte con alta 
constante del resorte en caso de que del péndulo planar.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">planares Pendel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Frühling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mechaniker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pendule planaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ressort</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mécanique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pêndulo planar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mola</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mecânicos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pendolo planare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">molla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">meccanici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επίπεδο εκκρεμές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άνοιξη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mecánicos</string>
          </keyword>
